headlines: Spot Bitcoin ETFs record $450M inflows in ‘early positioning’ push
Federal Reserve Board withdraws 2023 policy statement and issues new policy statement regarding the treatment of certain Board-supervised banks that facilitates responsible innovation
Federal Reserve Board announces termination of enforcement actions with The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. and Metropolitan Commercial Bank
Agencies announce dollar thresholds for smaller loan exemption from appraisal requirements for higher-priced mortgage loans
Agencies announce dollar thresholds for applicability of truth in lending and consumer leasing rules for consumer credit and lease transactions
events: SEC regulatory pressure on tokenized securities
Regulatory shift: Caroline Pham (CFTC) joining crypto firm MoonPay
JPMorgan advances tokenized dollar initiatives, suggesting growing institutional adoption of digital assets in traditional finance.
Potential XRP price drop due to technical analysis
Corporate partnership: Bitcoin miner Hut 8 securing $75M deal with Google
Bitcoin ETF inflows surge with BTC dominance reaching 60% - indicating strong institutional interest and market consolidation.
ARK Invest makes significant new investment in crypto-related stocks (COIN, BLSH, BMNR) despite market weakness - signaling confidence in long-term crypto adoption.
Institutional adoption: DTCC issuing tokenized securities on Canton Network
